CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 频繁地；经常；往往；常常；通常；屡次；多次；时常；经常地；大多

word_group.brief_definition: 多长时间一次；多久一次
时常, 经常, 偶尔
通常致命的；往往致命；常常致命
常常延迟；经常延迟；往往延宕
最经常执行；最常见的表现
经常延迟的航班；经常延误的飞机；经常延迟的汽车

list.abstract: Often（英[ˈɒfn]，美[ˈɔːfn]），英语单词，副词，意思为经常；常常。短语搭配有more often than not（多半）。例句为“They often hunt for food at dawn, in the evening, or in the middle of the night.（它们经常在黄昏、晚上或半夜寻找食物。）” Often副词类近义词有forever、frequently等，相关反义词有infrequently、rarely。比较级为more often。最高级为most often。
《Often》是加拿大歌手The Weeknd演唱的歌曲。收录在The Weeknd2014年6月发行的专辑《often》中。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you often experience social anxiety?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是否会经常产生社交焦虑？

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, yummy, yummy! We should do this more often.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大餐啊大餐！我们以后要经常这样约会。

yingyinNormal.en: How often do you use that line? Not as often as you use yours.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你经常用这句台词吗？没你那句用得多。

yingyinNormal.en: You don't do it that often. Well, you miss a lot of it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你也不是经常那样做，因为很多次你都没听懂。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you often dream things that happen just as you dreamed them?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是否经常梦见一些事情，而后它们就如你所梦的那样发生？

yingyinNormal.en: His animals often try to escape. They are smart. He has to be smarter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他的动物经常试图逃跑，它们很聪明，所以他必须更聪明。

yingyinNormal.en: And often the barm was used off the top to rise the bread so that was the yeast board.
yingyinNormal.zh: 酵母经常被用来发面包，也就是现在的酵母片。

yingyinNormal.en: To Galahad. Harry said you don't like to break the rules, often. Why now?
yingyinNormal.zh: 敬加拉哈德。哈利说你不喜欢经常破坏规矩。现在又是为何？

yingyinNormal.en: What? In situations like this, best girlfriends are often catty about the other woman.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么？在这样的情况下，闺蜜经常都一起声讨小三的。

yingyinNormal.en: At times, there were long periods of estrangement. We hurt each other often and deeply.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们曾有过很长时间的疏离，我们经常深深地伤害对方。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't think of me too often. I don't want you getting sad. Just live well. Just live.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不要经常想念我，我不想让你伤心，好好活着，好好的就行。

yingyinNormal.en: People often ask me how I did it. I can assure you it wasn't because of my uniqueness as a person.
yingyinNormal.zh: 人们经常问我是怎么做到的。我向你保证不是因为我有什么与众不同。

yingyinNormal.en: All thanks to my noisy Daddy. Well done, Daddy Pig. We should have you to stay more often.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这可多亏了我那个吵闹的爸爸。做得不错，猪爸爸。我们应该经常邀请你来做客。

yingyinNormal.en: Traditionally, the dragon was a sign of strength and power and it was often used by China's emperors as their own symbol.
yingyinNormal.zh: 传统上，龙象征着力量和权力，中国的皇帝经常拿它作为自己的象征。

yingyinNormal.en: For years after I had children, I would say pretty often I don't feel guilty working even when no one asked.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我有了小孩之后，经常会和自己说，我对工作并不感到内疚 哪怕没人问的时候。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《Facebook COO谢丽尔·桑德伯格哈佛演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: Granny Pig, you smell even nicer than you did before. Yes, you should use perfume de muddy puddle more often.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪奶奶，你闻起来比之前更好闻了。是的，你应该经常使用泥坑味道的香水。哈哈哈哈哈哈！

yingyinNormal.en: Granny Pig, you smell even nicer than you did before. Yes, you should use perfume de muddy puddle more often.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪奶奶，你闻起来比之前更好闻了。是的，你应该经常使用泥坑味道的香水。哈哈哈哈哈哈！

yingyinNormal.en: First job. Whose nephew are you? Why does Mark listen to you? I don't think he does very often. He just did.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第一份工作，你是谁的亲戚吗？马克为什么听你的？没觉得他经常听我的。他刚才就听你的了。

yingyinNormal.en: In our political system and in the media, we often see the reflection of a country that is polarized, that is paralyzed and is self-interested.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在我们的政体与媒体中，我们会经常会见到一个极化的，麻痹而又自私的国家缩影。

yingyinNormal.en: PS: An awesome down-to-earth example of stable orbits are the hyperbolic funnels that you often see at museums or in shopping malls.
yingyinNormal.zh: 备注：一个非常棒且实际关于稳定轨道的例子是我们经常能够在博物馆或是购物中心看见的大型"漏斗"。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: "Machine learning <highlight>often</highlight> provides a more reliable form of statistics, which makes data more valuable," says Winston.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “机器学习往往提供一种更可靠的统计形式，这使得数据更有价值。”Winston说。

examination_example.sentence: Progressives <highlight>often</highlight> support diversity mandates as a path to equality and a way to level the playing field.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 进步人士大多支持将多元化规定，将其当作通向平等的道路和创造公平竞争环境的途径。

examination_example.sentence: On the other hand, putting your faith in the wrong place <highlight>often</highlight> carries a high price.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一方面，在错误的地方施以信任，往往会付出高昂的代价。

examination_example.sentence: We <highlight>often</highlight> feel the need to tell others how we feel, whether it's a concern about a project, a stray thought, or a compliment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们经常觉得有必要告诉别人我们的感受，无论是对一个项目的关注，一个偶然出现的想法，还是一句赞美。

examination_example.sentence: As Moritz puts it, how <highlight>often</highlight> are federal dollars building homes that are likely to be lost to a wildfire?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正如Moritz所说，联邦资金有多少次是在建造可能被野火烧掉的房屋？

examination_example.sentence: Chances are, your headshots are seen much more <highlight>often</highlight> now than a decade or two ago.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在，你的头像可能比十几二十年前更经常被人看到。

word_usage.usage:
如果句子较长或为了强调，often也可以放在句首，这时常常引起主谓倒装。如：
Often did we warn them not to do so.
我们曾多次警告他们不要这么做。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Compared with face-to-face communication, books <highlight>often</highlight> provide a better medium for changing people's beliefs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与面对面的交流相比，书籍往往为改变人们的信仰提供了更好的媒介。

examination_example.sentence: When we have to choose between the two, people <highlight>often</highlight> select friends and family over facts.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我们不得不在两者之间做出选择时，人们通常会选择朋友和家人，而不是事实。

examination_example.sentence: The country, as the unit of authority, is <highlight>often</highlight> a convenient way of generalizing about a population.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 国家作为权力单位，通常是概括人口的一种方便的方法。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: They are <highlight>often</highlight> regarded as most treasured talents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们通常被认为是最珍贵的人才。

examination_example.sentence: Children aged four are <highlight>often</highlight> more curious than older children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 四岁的孩子往往比大一点的孩子更好奇。

examination_example.sentence: Parents <highlight>often</highlight> praise, believing they are building their child's self-confidence.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 父母经常表扬孩子，认为这样可以培养孩子的自信心。

word_usage.usage: often在句中常位于实义动词之前，be动词、情态动词、助动词之后。表示强调时可放在句子开头或结尾。如：He is often late for school.他经常上学迟到。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Why do we <highlight>often</highlight> assume that more is more when it comes to kids and their belongings?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么当涉及到孩子和他们的财产时，我们总是认为越多越好？

examination_example.sentence: The general rule is that mild zones have relatively few languages, <highlight>often</highlight> spoken by many people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一般来说，（气候）温和的地区的语言相对较少，但使用人数却很多。

examination_example.sentence: This picture <highlight>often</highlight> brings back to me many happy memories of my high school days.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这张照片经常让我回想起高中时代的许多美好回忆。

examination_example.sentence: Students who take a gap year are <highlight>often</highlight> more mature and responsible.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 休学一年的学生通常更成熟、更有责任感。

word_usage.usage: often在句中常位于实义动词之前，be动词、情态动词、助动词之后。表示强调时可放在句子开头或结尾。如：He is often late for school.他经常上学迟到。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 多长时间一次；多久一次

examination_example.sentence: How <highlight>often</highlight> do you help to do housework?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你多久帮忙做一次家务？

examination_example.sentence: Nature and culture are <highlight>often</highlight> seen as opposite ideas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自然和文化经常被视为对立的观念。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>often</highlight> have football training on the playground.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们经常在操场上进行足球训练。

word_usage.usage: often是频度副词，表示“经常”，通常位于助动词、be动词或情态动词之后，行为动词之前，有时也可以位于句尾。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 意为“总是”，表示动作或状态中间没有间断。
意为“通常”，即很少有例外。
意为“常常”，不如usually那么频繁。
